verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of the sons of Korah.) O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Thou didst <S%H7521>show<s%> <S%H7521>favor<s%> to Thy <S%H776>land;<s%> Thou didst <S%H7725>restore<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
Thou didst <S%H5375>forgive<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of Thy <S%H5971>people;<s%> Thou didst <S%H3680>cover<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H9128>sin.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
Thou didst <S%H622>withdraw<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> Thy <S%H5678>fury;<s%> Thou didst <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>away<s%> from Thy <S%H2740>burning<s%> <S%H639>anger.<s%>
<S%H7725>Restore<s%> us, O <S%H430>God<s%> of our <S%H3468>salvation,<s%> And cause Thine <S%H3708>indignation<s%> <S%H5973>toward<s%> us to <S%H6565>cease.<s%>
Wilt Thou be <S%H599>angry<s%> with us <S%H5769>forever<s%>? Wilt Thou <S%H4900>prolong<s%> Thine <S%H639>anger<s%> to <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>?
Wilt Thou not <S%H859>Thyself<s%> <S%H2421>revive<s%> us <S%H7725>again,<s%> That Thy <S%H5971>people<s%> may <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in Thee?
<S%H7200>Show<s%> us Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And <S%H5414>grant<s%> us Thy <S%H3468>salvation.<s%>

I will <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H1696>say;<s%> For He will <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> to His <S%H5971>people,<s%> to His <S%H2623>godly<s%> <S%H2623>ones;<s%> But let them not <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> to <S%H3690>folly.<s%>
<S%H389>Surely<s%> His <S%H3468>salvation<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> to those who <S%H3372>fear<s%> Him, That <S%H9202>glory<s%> may <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in our <S%H776>land.<s%>
<S%H2617>Lovingkindness<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> have <S%H6298>met<s%> together; <S%H6664>Righteousness<s%> and <S%H7965>peace<s%> have <S%H5401>kissed<s%> each other.
<S%H1571>Indeed,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H9185>what<s%> is <S%H9185>good;<s%> And our <S%H776>land<s%> will <S%H5414>yield<s%> its <S%H2981>produce.<s%>
<S%H6664>Righteousness<s%> will <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Him, And will <S%H7760>make<s%> His <S%H6471>footsteps<s%> into a <S%H1870>way.<s%>
